channel.title: Adding skillcapes?
channel.description: How do I make it so when you get 99 of a skill,it gives you that Cape & Hood in your inventory.

item.title: Adding skillcapes?
item.dc:creator: @frugoo_scape frugoo scape
item.description:
@frugoo_scape wrote:

Put in the lvl up void
if(playerLevel[X])addItem(XX);

Where X =
0 “attack”,
1 “defence”,
2 “strength”,
3 “hitpoints”
4 “ranged”,
5 “prayer”,
6 “magic”,
7 “cooking”,
8 “woodcutting”,
9 “fletching”,
10 “fishing”,
11 “firemaking”,
12 “crafting”,
13 “smithing”,
14 “mining”,
15 “herblore”,
16 “agility”,
17 “thieving”,
18 “slayer”,
19 “farming”,
20 “runecraft”

XX = Item Id

Read full topic
